channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Ultimate Nofollow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Ultimate Nofollow

item.title: CVE-2021-24817|2024-08-03T19:42:17.351Z -- unknown -- ultimate%20nofollow
item.description: The Ultimate NoFollow WordPress plugin through 1.4.8 does not sanitise and escape the href attribute of its shortcodes, allowing users with a role as low as contributor to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks
